channel.title: Comments on: Wanted: Warcraft Class Guides

item.title: By: Byron Ellacott
item.dc:creator: Byron Ellacott
item.description:
Hmm. Sarcasm detector is onna blink today, but i'm pretty sure players already host patch files, via shittorrent. And the Bloodelf Crusade trailer, too. And hell, all the guild management tools an MMO should be providing. And the quest databases for shit like "Find Parqual Fintalas in the Undercity. Go on, muahaha."
Next month: Blizzard seeks players to host game servers.
item.content:encoded:
Hmm. Sarcasm detector is onna blink today, but i’m pretty sure players already host patch files, via shittorrent. And the Bloodelf Crusade trailer, too. And hell, all the guild management tools an MMO should be providing. And the quest databases for shit like “Find Parqual Fintalas in the Undercity. Go on, muahaha.”

Next month: Blizzard seeks players to host game servers.
